Name: Idly
Ingredients: Idli rice, Urad dal, Fenugreek seeds, Salt, Water

Name: Dosa
Ingredients: Rice flour, Urad dal, Fenugreek seeds, Salt, Water

Name: Masala Dosa
Ingredients: Rice flour, Urad dal, Fenugreek seeds, Potatoes, Onions, Green chilies, Ginger, Turmeric powder, Mustard seeds, Curry leaves, Oil, Salt, Water

Name: Pongal
Ingredients: Rice, Moong dal, Black pepper, Cumin seeds, Ginger, Ghee, Cashew nuts

Name: Vada
Ingredients: Urad dal, Green chilies, Ginger, Curry leaves, Asafoetida, Salt, Oil

Name: Sambar
Ingredients: Toor dal, Mixed vegetables (like carrots, beans, potatoes, drumsticks), Tamarind, Sambar powder, Turmeric powder, Asafoetida, Mustard seeds, Curry leaves, Dry red chilies, Oil, Salt, Water

Name: Paneer Tikka
Ingredients: Paneer (Indian cottage cheese), Bell peppers, Onions, Yogurt, Ginger-garlic paste, Spices (like cumin powder, coriander powder, garam masala), Lemon juice, Oil, Salt

Name: Butter Chicken
Ingredients: Chicken, Tomatoes, Onions, Ginger-garlic paste, Cream, Butter, Spices (like cumin powder, coriander powder, garam masala), Kasuri methi (dried fenugreek leaves), Cashew nuts, Lemon juice, Oil, Salt

Name: Aloo Paratha
Ingredients: Whole wheat flour, Potatoes, Onions, Green chilies, Ginger, Coriander leaves, Spices (like cumin seeds, coriander powder), Oil, Salt

Name: Rajma
Ingredients: Kidney beans, Onions, Tomatoes, Ginger, Garlic, Green chilies, Spices (like cumin seeds, coriander powder, garam masala), Kasuri methi (dried fenugreek leaves), Coriander leaves, Oil, Salt
